mapper.select: SELECT N.NOTICE_SEQ, N.TITLE, N.CONTENTS, N.READ_CNT, U.USER_NAME, N.USER_ID, N.EXT, DATE_FORMAT(N.REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS REG_DT, N.SAVE_FILE_NAME AS FILE_NAME, N.SAVE_FILE_PATH AS FILE_PATH, N.ORG_FILE_NAME FROM NOTICE N, USER U WHERE N.USER_ID = U.USER_ID ORDER BY N.REG_DT DESC

SELECT N.NOTICE_SEQ, N.TITLE, N.READ_CNT, U.USER_NAME, N.USER_ID, N.CONTENTS, N.SAVE_FILE_NAME AS FILE_NAME, N.SAVE_FILE_PATH AS FILE_PATH, N.ORG_FILE_NAME, DATE_FORMAT(N.REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS REG_DT, N.EXT FROM NOTICE N, USER U WHERE N.USER_ID = U.USER_ID AND N.NOTICE_SEQ = #{noticeSeq}
mapper.update: UPDATE NOTICE SET READ_CNT = READ_CNT + 1 WHERE NOTICE_SEQ = #{noticeSeq}

UPDATE NOTICE SET TITLE = #{title}, CONTENTS = #{contents}, CHG_ID = #{userId}, CHG_DT = NOW(), SAVE_FILE_NAME = #{fileName}, SAVE_FILE_PATH = #{filePath}, ORG_FILE_NAME = #{orgFileName}, EXT = #{ext} WHERE NOTICE_SEQ = #{noticeSeq}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM notice_info ORDER BY read_cnt DESC LIMIT 5;
